mapper.sql: SELF_ID, MERCH_ID, MEM_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, ADDRESS, POST_CODE, CONTACT, CONT_PHONE, CONT_ADDRESS, CONT_POST, CONT_EMAIL, SETL_CYCLE, CHARGE, DEPOSIT, RISK_VER, ROUT_VER, CACODE, MCC, MCC_LIST, TRANSFACTORS, STATUS, IN_USER, IN_TIME, STEXA_USER, STEXA_TIME, STEXA_OPT, CVLEXA_USER, CVLEXA_TIME, CVLEXA_OPT, NOTES, REMARKS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_merch_deta_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_merch_deta_apply (SELF_ID, MERCH_ID, MEM_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, ADDRESS, POST_CODE, CONTACT, CONT_PHONE, CONT_ADDRESS, CONT_POST, CONT_EMAIL, SETL_CYCLE, CHARGE, DEPOSIT, RISK_VER, ROUT_VER, CACODE, MCC, MCC_LIST, TRANSFACTORS, STATUS, IN_USER, IN_TIME, STEXA_USER, STEXA_TIME, STEXA_OPT, CVLEXA_USER, CVLEXA_TIME, CVLEXA_OPT, NOTES, REMARKS) values (#{selfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setlCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{riskVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mccList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfactors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cvlexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cvlexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cvlexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_merch_deta_apply
SELF_ID = #{record.selfId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MERCH_ID = #{record.merchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEM_ID = #{record.memId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMBER_NAME = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{record.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{record.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_PHONE = #{record.contPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_ADDRESS = #{record.contAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_POST = #{record.contPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_EMAIL = #{record.contEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETL_CYCLE = #{record.setlCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE = #{record.charge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{record.deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RISK_VER = #{record.riskVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUT_VER = #{record.routVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CACODE = #{record.cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC = #{record.mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC_LIST = #{record.mccList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFACTORS = #{record.transfactors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_USER = #{record.inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME = #{record.inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STEXA_USER = #{record.stexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEXA_TIME = #{record.stexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STEXA_OPT = #{record.stexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CVLEXA_USER = #{record.cvlexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CVLEXA_TIME = #{record.cvlexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CVLEXA_OPT = #{record.cvlexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTES = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_merch_deta_apply set SELF_ID = #{record.selfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MERCH_ID = #{record.merchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEM_ID = #{record.memId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMBER_NAME = #{record.memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{record.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{record.contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_PHONE = #{record.contPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_ADDRESS = #{record.contAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_POST = #{record.contPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_EMAIL = #{record.contEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETL_CYCLE = #{record.setlCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE = #{record.charge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{record.deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RISK_VER = #{record.riskVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUT_VER = #{record.routVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CACODE = #{record.cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCC = #{record.mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCC_LIST = #{record.mccList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFACTORS = #{record.transfactors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_USER = #{record.inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IN_TIME = #{record.inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STEXA_USER = #{record.stexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEXA_TIME = #{record.stexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STEXA_OPT = #{record.stexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CVLEXA_USER = #{record.cvlexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CVLEXA_TIME = #{record.cvlexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CVLEXA_OPT = #{record.cvlexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTES = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_merch_deta_apply
MERCH_ID = #{merchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEM_ID = #{memId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_PHONE = #{contPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_ADDRESS = #{contAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_POST = #{contPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONT_EMAIL = #{contEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETL_CYCLE = #{setlCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RISK_VER = #{riskVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUT_VER = #{routVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CACODE = #{cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC = #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC_LIST = #{mccList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSFACTORS = #{transfactors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_USER = #{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STEXA_USER = #{stexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEXA_TIME = #{stexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STEXA_OPT = #{stexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CVLEXA_USER = #{cvlexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CVLEXA_TIME = #{cvlexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CVLEXA_OPT = #{cvlexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SELF_ID = #{selfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_merch_deta_apply set MERCH_ID = #{merchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEM_ID = #{memId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_PHONE = #{contPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_ADDRESS = #{contAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_POST = #{contPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONT_EMAIL = #{contEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETL_CYCLE = #{setlCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RISK_VER = #{riskVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUT_VER = #{routVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CACODE = #{cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCC = #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCC_LIST = #{mccList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFACTORS = #{transfactors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_USER = #{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IN_TIME = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STEXA_USER = #{stexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEXA_TIME = #{stexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STEXA_OPT = #{stexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CVLEXA_USER = #{cvlexaUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CVLEXA_TIME = #{cvlexaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CVLEXA_OPT = #{cvlexaOpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SELF_ID = #{selfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT mda.*, ca.CANAME AS CANAME, pd.PARA_NAME AS TRANSFACTORS_NAME, md.MCCNAME AS MCC_NAME, ml.MCCCONT AS MCC_LIST_NAME FROM t_merch_deta_apply AS mda LEFT JOIN t_coop_agency AS ca ON mda.CACODE = ca.CACODE AND ca.`STATUS` = '00' LEFT JOIN t_para_dic AS pd ON mda.TRANSFACTORS = pd.PARA_CODE AND pd.`STATUS` = '1' LEFT JOIN t_mcc_desc AS md ON mda.MCC = md.MCC LEFT JOIN t_mcc_list AS ml ON mda.MCC_LIST = ml.MCCLIST AND ml.`STATUS` = '1' WHERE mda.SELF_ID = #{selfId} AND mda.`STATUS` != '99'
